process.command:
image_id bigserial,	
			scene_id TEXT NOT NULL,	
			source TEXT NOT NULL,	
			product TEXT,
			folder TEXT,
			acquisition_date_str varchar,
			acquisition_date date,
			path smallint,
			row smallint,
    		create_date date DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    		PRIMARY KEY (source, product, folder, acquisition_date_str, path, row)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id TEXT,	
            status char(1) NOT NULL,
            neighbors smallint,
    		PRIMARY KEY (image_id, plot_id)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id TEXT,	
            band varchar,
            srfi integer,
    		PRIMARY KEY (image_id, plot_id, band)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id TEXT,	
            band varchar,
            srfi integer,
    		PRIMARY KEY (image_id, plot_id, band)

image_id bigint,
			plot_id TEXT,	
            band varchar,
            srfi integer,
            srfi_std integer,
    		PRIMARY KEY (image_id, plot_id, band)
